short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: (◔◡◔) invisible character, blank character, invisible letter or empty space for discord (Copy and Paste)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
this extension help you to copy and paste invisible character, invisible letter with ease.

Invisible character, As The Name Suggests, Is A Kind Of Empty Blank Space. It Seems Like Space But Actually, It Is A Unicode. People Call It By Different Names For Example Blank Space, Hidden Text, Invisible Space Text, Empty Character, Invisible Letter, Or A White Space Character. Some People Call It Magic/joke Text As It Can Be Used To Joke Around With Friends. Because It Is Cool To See As The Receiver Is Surprised How The Sender Has Done It.

Invisible letters can also be used in Fortnite game. We use such blank space in games because blank space hides our usernames in the game. So it seems that we have not entered the username. You can download such black characters from our site for free. And you can use it easily in your game.
